title: The deeplabcutcore cannot be computed on the GPU （RTX 3090 + tf2.4 + cuda11.1 + cudnn8.0.5 ）
body:
OS: ubuntu 18.04
DeepLabCut Version: deeplabcutcore
WxPython version: 4.0.4
Tensorflow version: 2.4.0

The problem:Hello, I followed the steps to install all the environment, and can import deeplabcutcore.But the RTX 3090 didn't seem to be used at the beginning of the training.

`Python 3.7.10 (default, Feb 26 2021, 18:47:35) 
[GCC 7.3.0] :: Anaconda, Inc. on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import deeplabcutcore
>>> config_path='/home/hjh/DLC/run1-hjh-2021-03-18/config.yaml'
>>> deeplabcutcore.train_network(config_path)
Config:
{'all_joints': [[0], [1], [2], [3], [4], [5]],
 'all_joints_names': ['bodypart1',
                      'bodypart2',
                      'bodypart3',
                      'objectA',
                      'b4',
                      'b5'],
 'alpha_r': 0.02,
 'batch_size': 1,
 'bottomheight': 400,
 'crop': False,
 'crop_pad': 0,
 'cropratio': 0.4,
 'dataset': 'training-datasets/iteration-0/UnaugmentedDataSet_run1Mar18/run1_hjh95shuffle1.mat',
 'dataset_type': 'imgaug',
 'decay_steps': 30000,
 'deterministic': False,
 'display_iters': 50,
 'fg_fraction': 0.25,
 'global_scale': 0.8,
 'init_weights': '/home/hjh/miniconda3/envs/test2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/models/pretrained/resnet_v1_50.ckpt',
 'intermediate_supervision': False,
 'intermediate_supervision_layer': 12,
 'leftwidth': 400,
 'location_refinement': True,
 'locref_huber_loss': True,
 'locref_loss_weight': 0.05,
 'locref_stdev': 7.2801,
 'log_dir': 'log',
 'lr_init': 0.0005,
 'max_input_size': 1500,
 'mean_pixel': [123.68, 116.779, 103.939],
 'metadataset': 'training-datasets/iteration-0/UnaugmentedDataSet_run1Mar18/Documentation_data-run1_95shuffle1.pickle',
 'min_input_size': 64,
 'minsize': 100,
 'mirror': False,
 'multi_step': [[0.005, 10000],
                [0.02, 430000],
                [0.002, 730000],
                [0.001, 1030000]],
 'net_type': 'resnet_50',
 'num_joints': 6,
 'optimizer': 'sgd',
 'pairwise_huber_loss': False,
 'pairwise_predict': False,
 'partaffinityfield_predict': False,
 'pos_dist_thresh': 17,
 'project_path': '/home/hjh/DLC/run1-hjh-2021-03-18',
 'regularize': False,
 'rightwidth': 400,
 'rotation': 25,
 'rotratio': 0.4,
 'save_iters': 3000,
 'scale_jitter_lo': 0.5,
 'scale_jitter_up': 1.25,
 'scoremap_dir': 'test',
 'shuffle': True,
 'snapshot_prefix': '/home/hjh/DLC/run1-hjh-2021-03-18/dlc-models/iteration-0/run1Mar18-trainset95shuffle1/train/snapshot',
 'stride': 8.0,
 'topheight': 400,
 'weigh_negatives': False,
 'weigh_only_present_joints': False,
 'weigh_part_predictions': False,
 'weight_decay': 0.0001}
Starting with imgaug pose-dataset loader.

  warnings.warn('`layer.apply` is deprecated and '
WARNING:tensorflow:From /home/hjh/miniconda3/envs/tensorflow2.4/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcutcore/pose_estimation_tensorflow/nnet/losses.py:38: to_float (from tensorflow.python.ops.math_ops) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Instructions for updating:
Use `tf.cast` instead.
Loading ImageNet-pretrained resnet_50
